channel.title: Editing Private Clients!
channel.description: Well i am editing a client to fit mine and i was wondering how do i get rid of the flames on the side? I have tryed about 8 or 9 now and they all have flames on the side is there a way to get rid of them?

item.title: Editing Private Clients!
item.dc:creator: @_CopyRight CopyRight
item.description:
@_CopyRight wrote:

Show me a picture of it.

Read full topic

item.title: Editing Private Clients!
item.dc:creator: @mjstar mjstar
item.description:
@mjstar wrote:

[quote=“© CopyRight ©, post:4, topic:115745”]Open up your client folder.

Open up: Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java . Search for:

            Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage

By that you will see this…

("imagenamehere.jpg");

Change the “imagenamehere” to what you saved your background image as.

Save and close it. Now, compile your client and click run[/quote]

!!! OK MY PICTURE DOES SHOW UP!!! I KNOW HOW TO DO THAT!!!
the problem is on top of my pictures shows flames burning i have know idea why!!

Read full topic

item.title: Editing Private Clients!
item.dc:creator: @_CopyRight CopyRight
item.description:
@_CopyRight wrote:

Open up your client folder.

Open up: Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java . Search for:

            Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage

By that you will see this…

("imagenamehere.jpg");

Change the “imagenamehere” to what you saved your background image as.

Save and close it. Now, compile your client and click run

Read full topic

item.title: Editing Private Clients!
item.dc:creator: @mjstar mjstar
item.description:
@mjstar wrote:

[quote=“© CopyRight ©, post:2, topic:115745”]Just get a blank sheet on paint, then put a picture, make it fit 766 x 503 (you should check to make sure)

Then you will not have flames, Delete that deobs and animation otherwise if the new picture does not work.[/quote]
I did make a new picture and made it fit thats why i am trying to get rid of the flames!! And i cant seem to find the animation anywhere!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Editing Private Clients!
item.dc:creator: @_CopyRight CopyRight
item.description:
@_CopyRight wrote:

Just get a blank sheet on paint, then put a picture, make it fit 766 x 503 (you should check to make sure)

Then you will not have flames, Delete that deobs and animation otherwise if the new picture does not work.

Read full topic
